headline: RBC Highlights JPMorgan’s Diversified Strength and Long-Term Payoff
summary: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE:JPM) is included among the 15 Best S&P 500 Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2026. On January 14, RBC Capital analyst Gerard Cassidy reiterated his Outperform rating on JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE:JPM) and kept his $330 price target after the bank’s Q4 results. Cassidy said JPMorgan continues to put up […]

headline: How Investors May Respond To Exponent (EXPO) After JP Morgan's New Overweight Rating
summary: JP Morgan recently initiated coverage on Exponent with an Overweight/Buy rating, highlighting the firm’s position as a leading science and engineering consulting company and expressing confidence in its growth and profitability prospects. An interesting angle for investors is that this fresh endorsement comes from an analyst with a track record of positive returns, adding weight to the new coverage. We’ll now explore how the upbeat JP Morgan initiation and its emphasis on Exponent’s...
